snippet: Our democracy, a miraculous gathering of diverse players, needs participants to play fair.
abstract: Op-Ed article by filmmaker Milos Forman disputes those who accuse Pres Obama of being a socialist; contends that such claims cheapen the experience of millions who lived and continue to live under brutal forms of socialism.
lead_paragraph: Our democracy, a miraculous gathering of diverse players, needs participants to play fair.
